title: Murad Hydro-Dynamic Ultimate Moisture 1.7 oz.-1.7 oz.
description: Experience an Uber-Rich MoisturizerMeet the single most hydrating moisturizer Murad has ever offered. Ultra-concentrated and intensely hydrating, this velvety cream provides all-day moisture, smoothness and comfort - leaving your skin positively radiant.Utterly rich yet completely non-greasyLocks in optimal moisture for eight hoursRestores resilience, softness and toneProvides lush, instant relief from drynessEspecially Suited For:All skin types, and especially those concerned about drynessEssential Elements:Avocado, Sunflower and Olive Fruit Oils enhance the skin's ability to retain maximum levels of hydration. Retinyl Palmitate and Shea Butter improve texture while restoring natural smoothness and softness. Collagen Support Complex boosts skin's resilience and plumps dehydrated skin.For Best Effect:Every day after cleansing and toning, massage evenly over face, neck and chest. For optimal results, first apply recommended Murad treatment and follow with Murad sunblock during the day.

title: SCALPICIN Max Strength Scalp Itch Treatment, 1.5 Ounce
description: Odorless, greaseless formula won't interfere with the way your hair looks and feels. Can be used every day anytime and anywhere. Temporarily relieves itching associated with minor skin irritation and rashes due to seborrheic dermatitis and psoriasis.

title: Suave Suave Kids Cherry Vanilla Bop Mousse, 7 Ounce
Burt's Bees  Lip Shimmer, Champagne, 0.09 oz.
description: Want your lips to speak volumes? Give them a smooch of luminescent color with our luscious Lip Shimmers. Shea Butter and antioxidant-rich Fruit Oils moisturize, nourish and soften lips naturally and lovingly. Choose our Radiance Lip Shimmer for a sheer glow or try one of our other beautiful shades. title: Burt's Bees Beeswax Moisturizing Night Creme, 1-Ounce Jar
description: Formulated with Vitamin E and botanical oils, this night creme helps moisturize, nourish and minimize the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles naturally.

title: Garnier Moisture Rescue Refreshing Gel-Cream, Grape Water Extract, Vitamin E,  1.70-Fluid Ounce
description: Through collaboration with dermatologists and nutritionists, garnier has developed nutritioniste with "skin-nutrients", targeted to help your skin stay healthy looking and beautiful, day after day. Ingredient complexes developed exclusively by garnier to work on skin's outer layer.garnier nutritioniste(r) moisture rescue refreshing gel-cream locks in moisture for 24 hours, blocks out dryness. A light, oil free, gel-cream texture penetrates deeply into skin's upper layers so that skin looks and feels soft and smooth. Garnier nutritioniste(r) moisture rescue refreshing gel-cream is dermatologist tested for safety; non comedogenic - won't clog pores; gentle to skin; allergy tested; non-greasy.how is it different? Garnier nutritioniste moisture rescue refreshing gel-cream locks in moisture and blocks out dryness using a formula with a unique combination of pure antioxidant fruit water extracts and skin conditioning. Its ultra-lightweight, oil-free, refreshing gel-cream formula instantly penetrates for long-lasting moisture and boosts skin's defenses as it holds moisture for 24 hours. "skin-nutrient" facts - moisture rescue with: grape water extract: antioxidant power defends skin from external aggressors; vitamin e: soothes and conditions skin. Results - instantly: skin looks and feels supple and smooth. In 1 hour skin's moisture barrier is strengthened to prevent dryness. Ingredient complexes developed exclusively by garnier to work on skin's outer layer.

title: Olay Age Defying Moisturizing Body Wash With Vitamin E 13.5 Oz
OGX Shampoo, Repairing Awapuhi Ginger, 13oz
description: Indulge in a lavish, moisturizing creamy formula infused with the Hawaiian beauty secret of nutrient rich awapuhi ginger extract to instantly mend and soften dry, coarse hair while stimulating the scalp with freshness, rich keratin proteins fortify each strand creating restored, soft, strengthened hair from the inside out.

title: Burt's Bees Very Volumizing Pomegranate Conditioner, 10 Fluid Ounces
description: Lightweight, gentle and rich with amino acids, Burt's Bees Pomegranate Conditioner leaves hair looking fuller and feeling thicker.  Formulated with nourishing Pomegranate Seed and Avocado Oils, it rinses out easily and helps detangle hair while adding softness and body every time you use it.
